message: Let's split it 50/50 to start with, it's a fair beginning!
I'll take the lead, but you can still get a decent share!
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but not that big! You can still get a good deal, let's talk!
I'll take a bigger share, but I'm willing to give you a small chance to get something!
I'm trying to be reasonable, but you're being too greedy! I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but not that much!
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a tiny fraction!
I'm not giving in yet! I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm not leaving without getting a significant share, you're running out of time!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you most of it, but I'm still holding out for a slightly better deal!
I'm not leaving without getting the majority, you're running out of options!
I'm almost out of options, but I'll give you most of it. Please, don't leave me with nothing!
It's now or never, take it or leave it!
